message: I'll give you $1, and you can have the rest. Don't be greedy!
I'll give you the majority, but not all. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a quarter, but you'll have to take it!
Getting closer to a deal, let's try again!
I'll give you a third, but it's my best offer so far!
Getting down to the wire, let's find a compromise!
